Title: Relates to the use of locomotive horns at private highway-rail grade crossings; repealer
Summary: Relates to the use of locomotive horns at private highway-rail grade crossings; establishes use of locomotive horn in the locomotive engineer's sole judgment, is appropriate in order to prevent imminent injury, death, or property damage.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง53-b, Rail L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the railroad law, in relation to the use of locomotive horns at private highway-rail grade crossings; and to repeal section 53-b of such law relating to ringing bells and blowing whistles at crossings
